item.title: Edit this please@@@@@@@@@@@@@
item.dc:creator: @stupidleung4 stupidleung4
item.description:
@stupidleung4 wrote:

I HAVE HYBRIDSCAPE BETA 1 AND ALL OF THESE GO ERRORS

COMPILE :

@echo off
COLOR 08
title compiling HybridScape - Beta 1
if not exist classes mkdir classes
javac -d ./classes ./src/*.java
pause

JDOC:

@echo off
javadoc -d ./javadoc ./src/*.java
pause

RUN:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title HybridScape - Beta 1
java -cp .;./classes; Server
pause

RUN&COMILE:

@echo off
COLOR 08
::I only add this because JBuilder makes backup files =
del .java~~
title HybridScape - Beta 1
if not exist classes mkdir classes
javac -d ./classes ./src/*.java
java -cp .;./classes; Server
pause

Read full topic
